ALGORITMOS¶

Esta parte do documento tem por objetivo documentar o restante do código que é utilizado internamente na API implementada. Esses módulos auxiliares estão dentro da pasta algorithms e repository.

QE - Quadratic Equation¶

equation_class

class algorithms.equation.equation.Equation(a, b, c)¶

equation_predictor

algorithms.equation.equation_predictor.calc_equation(equacao)¶

Parameters

equacao – object equation

Return result

roots of quadratic equation

algorithms.equation.equation_predictor.predictor_equation(json)¶

return prediction of json

Parameters

json – json with all items

Return result

equation and roots of quadratic equation

algorithms.equation.equation_predictor.round_up(n, decimals=0)¶

function to around

Parameters

  • n – number to around

  • decimals – total of decimals

Return result

rounded numeric value

Parameters

  • name – name to save

True in case of success or False in case of Fail
